columns.StuID: The unique identifier for each student.
columns.LName: The last name of the student.
columns.Fname: The first name of the student.
columns.Age: The age of the student in years.
columns.Major: The major field of study for the student.
columns.Advisor: The unique identifier for the student's advisor.
columns.city_code: The code representing the student's city.

Student.table_description: The purpose of this table is to store student information.

columns.FacID: The unique identifier for each faculty member.
columns.Lname: The last name of the faculty member.
columns.Fname: The first name of the faculty member.
columns.Rank: The academic rank of the faculty member.
columns.Sex: The gender of the faculty member.
columns.Phone: The contact phone number of the faculty member.
columns.Room: The room number assigned to the faculty member.
columns.Building: The building where the faculty member's office is located.

Faculty.table_description: The purpose of this table is to store faculty member information.

columns.DNO: The unique identifier for each department.
columns.Division: The division category to which the department belongs.
columns.Room: The room number assigned to the department.
columns.Building: The building where the department is located.
columns.DPhone: The contact phone number for the department.

Department.table_description: The purpose of this table is to store department information.

columns.FacID: The unique identifier for each faculty member in the department.
columns.DNO: The unique identifier for each department.
columns.Appt_Type: The type of appointment for the faculty member in the department.

Member_of.table_description: The purpose of this table is to store faculty department affiliations.

columns.CID: The unique identifier for each course.
columns.CName: The name of the course as listed in the catalog.
columns.Credits: The number of academic credits awarded for the course.
columns.Instructor: The unique identifier for the course instructor.
columns.Days: The days of the week when the course is held.
columns.Hours: The scheduled hours for the course sessions.
columns.DNO: The unique identifier for the department offering the course.

Course.table_description: The purpose of this table is to store course-related information.

columns.StuID: The unique identifier for each student pursuing a minor.
columns.DNO: The unique identifier for the department offering the minor.

Minor_in.table_description: The purpose of this table is to store student minor program information.

columns.StuID: The unique identifier for each student enrolled in courses.
columns.CID: The unique identifier for each course in which students are enrolled.
columns.Grade: The letter grade received by the student in the course.

Enrolled_in.table_description: The purpose of this table is to store student enrollment and grades.

columns.lettergrade: The letter grade assigned to a student's performance.
columns.gradepoint: The numeric grade point value corresponding to the letter grade.

Gradeconversion.table_description: The purpose of this table is to store grade conversion data.
